Resize Objects Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System

Select Set Width and Height from the Resize Objects pull-down menu on the toolbar on the front panel to display this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to resize multiple front panel objects to a specific size in pixels.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • Width—Sets the width in pixels to which you want to resize all the selected objects.
  • Apply Width—Sets the width of all the selected objects to the pixel size in the Width text box.
  • Height—Sets the height in pixels to which you want to resize all the selected objects.
  • Apply Height—Sets the height of all the selected objects to the pixel size in the Height text box.
  • Apply Width and Height—Sets the width and height of all the selected objects to the pixel size in the Width and Height text boxes.
  • Current Size Values—Lists the current size in pixels of all the selected objects. An asterisk appears next to values for objects that cannot be resized even if you change the Width or Height.
